  • Configure the Serial Port
  • View page source

Configure the Serial PortÔÉÅ

This section provides Serial Host interface configuration to send serial data (AT commands) to Talaria TWO. The host can be interfaced with Talaria TWO over UART/SPI. The default UART configuration is as follows:

  1. Baud Rate: 115200bps

  2. Data: 8 bits

  3. Parity: None

  4. Stop bits: 1 bit

  5. Flow Control: None

Using Teraterm, select USB Port #5 and baudrate 9600 since the firmware is configured with baudrate=9600.

Figure 4: Tera Term Setup
